Method Detail

getOpenAction

public javax.swing.Action getOpenAction()
In a departure from the standard UI, there is no "Open" command for this application Instead, the user can create a New window, Import a NEXUS file and Apply a Template file. None of these operations result in a file being associated with the DocumentFrame. All these actions are located in the BeautiFrame class. This overriden method should never be called and throw a RuntimeException if it is.

Overrides:
getOpenAction in class jam.framework.Application
Returns:
the action

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
